tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Punit Bhojani is an exceptional physician whose dedication and expertise guided me through every step of my pregnancy journey. From the initial prenatal visits to the delivery room, Dr. Bhojani’s compassionate care and attention to detail ensured both my baby’s and my well-being. His calm demeanor and reassuring presence alleviated any concerns or anxieties, making each appointment a positive experience. With his wealth of knowledge and professionalism, I felt confident and supported throughout the entire process. I am immensely grateful to Dr. Bhojani for his invaluable contribution to the safe arrival of my precious baby. I wholeheartedly recommend him to anyone seeking outstanding obstetric care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnancy Hypertension (Preeclampsia/ Eclampsia),
review: I am glad that I choose one of the finest doctor. Dr. Punit Bhojani's expertise and guidance made my pregnancy journey very easy. As it was my first pregnancy i had several doubts and anxiety but His availability and  promptness made my journey lot more comfortable

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I've been seeing Dr. Punit Bhojani for last two years now and I can't speak highly enough of the care I've received.
Dr. Punit is highly professional and also kind and very friendly. He take the time to listen to my concerns and always explain things in a way that is easy to understand. Dr. Punit can be reached conveniently via phone or WhatsApp for consultations and follow-ups that is a significant advantage.
I am grateful to know about him through my friends recommendation and now I am highly recommending Dr.Punit Bhojani to anyone seeking gynaecological care. Thank you for your outstanding service!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would like to start by thanking god that we found Dr. Punit Bhojani. When we moved to Mumbai we were looking for Gynaecologist . We did not know anyone there so we searched  to find the best gynaecologist in Mumbai. We found Dr.Punit and we decided to go to him. From day 1 of our consultation Dr.Punit  has been so helpful and resourceful. He always explain things very patiently. He is always ready to answer all our queries and is always reachable on mobile for anything urgent.He handled our case very professionally and perfectly and with his help we are blessed with the most precious gift of our life. He has a friendly nature due to which we never hesitate to reach out to her for any queries. I totally recommend Dr. Punit Bhojani for anything related to Gynaecology  and I am sure you will never regret your decision. Thanks to Dr. Punit  for always being there.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: He is very well versed with the subject. His team was kind and polite. He was prompt with his treatment. Very friendly and gentle. Would highly recommend. Dr Punit Bhojani thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Me & my wife recently had the privilege of receiving excellent care from our gynecologist, Dr.Punit Bhojani. From the moment we stepped into the clinic, we were greeted with warmth and professionalism. My experience with Dr.Punit Bhojani was nothing short of exceptional, and I want to share my gratitude through this review.

******** ******* ** *** **** ****** ******* *** ************* ** *** ****** *** he also possess a compassionate and caring demeanor that immediately put me and my wife at ease. He took the time to listen to our concerns, addressing each one with patience and empathy.
He thoroughly explained each step of the process, alleviating any apprehensions we may have had. His expertise, combined with his compassionate approach, sets him apart from the rest. I am truly grateful for the outstanding care we received pre-pregnancy, during pregnancy and post pregnancy. 
The clinic itself was clean, well-maintained, and equipped with state-of-the-art facilities. It was accommodating, and efficient, creating an atmosphere that promotes a positive patient experience.

Based on our remarkable experience, I wholeheartedly recommend Dr.Punit Bhojani to anyone seeking an exceptional gynecologist. 
Thank you, Dr.Punit Bhojani, for your commitment to providing excellent healthcare. Your dedication and passion for what you do are truly admirable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,
review:
THE BEST EXPERIENCE OF OUR LIVES.

We have been knowing Dr. Punit for over 10 years. For my wife’s pregnancy, he was the most-obvious go-to choice for us. He is ********* *************, patient in his approach & patient. But his biggest attribute is 'empathy'. He treats every patient differently. With us too, he ensured we were most comfortable with the pregnancy. We were literally hand-held through every procedure and test, the do’s & don’ts, all this without raising a single panic alarm. Always answers the call in the first ring (Unless he’s attending to some patient or conducting an operation), he won’t ask you to do 100 unnecessary tests and make life stressful. He was so sweet, he ensured we got the best hospital & service at optimum expenses.
As we had opted for a C-sec delivery, we were booked for the 24th of April. However, as my wife’s water broke on the 21st itself, we immediately contacted him in the morning around 9.30-10am. He was so calm and guided us with the procedure & other formalities. Within 3 hours, we were blessed with a baby girl. Thanks to Dr. Punit, our pregnancy has been the sweetest & most memorable part of our lives. 
We genuinely refer Dr. Punit to whoever wishes to make their pregnancy a blissful experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Always very forthcoming, and friendly. 

Explains everything in detail. 

Good follow up and prompt revert

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was referred Dr Punit by my friend who had her delivery done by him…I am based out of US and have been having vaginal and severe urine infection every since I moved here.. Dr Punit has been extremely understanding patient and very approachable.. His timey guidance and treatment had made things really better for me…Also when I did visit him in person when I travelled to India was indeed a vey good experience.. He helped me understand the issue, suggest beneficial suggestions to improve the condition as well as treatment have really helped me to get better..  At the end of the day you need a gynaecologist who can listen to your issues patiently and provide effective treatments and I feel Dr Punit had been a blessing to me.. I truly recommend him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
How confident you will Be to trust a new doctor with the MOST important thing of your life- Pregnancy, yes that was my dilemma when I first got to know abt my pregnancy but trust me you can blindly trust Dr. Punit in this, my pregnancy journey (difficult one this time) was not only made smooth with his constant positive boosting but he answered and reverted back to my distress calls at any hr of the day almost instantly.he and his team at Surya hospital Chembur also made sure I had smooth delivery and post partum transaction.
Thank you so much for being there Dr. Punit 😊

review:
I am really glad I came across Dr Punit as my gynaec. He is  the  most knowledgeable & one of the sweetest  Doctors I know of! 
He diagnosed me very well, made sure that I stay calm throughout, gave me assurance that my treatment will be very effective & offered me great guidance even for future times. He followed up with me very well & the best part was he was available at all times! Inspite of being a male gynaec, I was so comfortable with him to talk about my sexual health & otherwise too. 
The moment you enter his clinic, be rest assured you are in the safest hands!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
1. Very reachable and always just a call away.
2. Friendly 
3. Listen patiently to the problems
4. Ensures the patient is comfortable 
5. Explain the entire treatment in detail and all steps and helped us with best possible treatment 
6. These all qualities and experiences with him , have given us trust on him . 
7. When we met him , we were suggested ivf by other doctors.  But he revalidated all the reports and performed few tests and under his guidance, we are proud parents of two kids . One is 3 yrs and other one newly born.

Many thsnks to Dr. Bhojani for all his support snd guidance so far.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ******* ** *** ** *** **** **** ** ***** ** ********* *******. He is superb in explaining the reports, understanding the issues and helping the patient cope up with any situation very smoothly.I had few complications during my pregnancy but he was always there to guide and check on me.I would highly recommend him for anyone who is pregnant or plan to get pregnant as its a journey of a long period of time and Dr Bhojani is the perfect guide for this. Thanks and grateful for all his support and treatment that I received till now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Being an English expat it is always a nerve wracking experience going to new Doctors when you move to a new county, especially a Gynaecocologist. 

Dr Punit Bhojani totally put me at ease, explaining everything clearly and concisely. 

Having abnormal cells from a pap smear is always worrying but Dr Punit scheduled a colposcopy whilst reassuring me about the procedure.

He carried out the colposcopy with another Dr explaining the whole process along the way and letting me know of their findings immediately. 

I would not hesitate in recommending him and will definitely be visiting him again!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Dr. Bhojani first time in 2016 when I weaned my baby from breastfeeding. He was recommended to me by 
my obstetrician Dr. Sheriar, and a family reference. I was absolutely satisfied with his treatment, medicinal help for sourcing the tablet at a much discounted rate, and his diagnosis. Later, I had some irregular periods and hormonal imbalance which was perfectly handled by him and his medication, and actually saved me from a D&C procedure. I trust him with all that he recommends. A great doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My family, friends and I have been consulting Dr Punit Bhojani since the last 7 years and we are extremely happy to be under his treatment and guidance. He takes a holistic approach for all issues and treats with minimum surgical intervention unless absolutely needed.  He is an avid listener and keeps utmost empathy and patience. He is trained at the best medical college and team of senior veteran doctors and that makes him an expert in the field of gynaecology.  *** ** *** **** ***** ****** ** *** **** *** ** very well versed with international approaches and breakthroughs in this field. We totally trust him with his diagnosis and prescription. He is very approachable and prompt with responses under emergency. He keeps the patients' comfort and interest at heart and has a sharp acumen during the entire interaction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
We started our journey with Dr .Punit Bhojani in February 2018.
We trusted him and his expereince wholeheartedly. He has immense knowledge and experience. Dr Bhojani made us feel very comfortable and was very supportive thought our journey. 
Finally we decided to go through an IVF cycle,and within the 1st cycle we were successful.We were blessed with a baby girl.Dr Bhojani and his team are just phenomenal. He was just right by our side 24×7.Any point of time you call him for any query he is always very supportive,strong and very positive. This is a lifelong bond with Dr Punit Bhojani and his team.

Thank you for being us !
With all our blessings and love.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
It was a great and good experience. The suggestion and treatment was highly satisfactorily. The doctor fully understood our medical problem and helped for the treatment.  He has also been a great source of encouragement due to which we did not loose our hope.

Since we were already demotivated and disappointed due to the treatment we were taking forever last 4 years without any result. 


It was indeed very helpful and we were fortunate that we meet Dr.  Puneet 


Thanks alot sir

Sir our family is now complete and our twins are 5 years old....

tags: None
review:
I approached Dr. Bhojani through a friend as I was unable to conceive for 3 years. On Meeting him, he was soo positive about starting the treatment and was very polite and kind to explain the whole process and treatment. In just 4 months I conceived and am blessed with a baby boy through 'NORMAL DELIVERY'
Dr. Bhojani was god sent for us and we are soo grateful for him. 
His way of treatment is way different than others. On every visit he explains the procedures and how to handle things.. He is kind, polite, generous and is very warm to talk to. 
I would definitely recommend him to all.. Infact I recently referred him to one of my friend and even she has conceived through him. 
If anyone needs help with any gynaecological problem plz approach him undoubtedly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was a blessing to have Dr Bhojani sir as my obstetrician,. He was very friendly, available at all times of need, offering the right guidance and advice throughout my pregnancy,. Would highly recommend sir for anyone looking for a caring* ************* ************ ** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I and my husband had visited doctor Punit for Pregnancy planning.He guided us very well,the best part is he is available on what's app and calls always.
My nine months pregnancy journey was very much at ease. Appreciate his friendly nature and promt guidance.Am forever grateful to him. Highly recommended!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Punit Doctor is so polite, friendly and so positive that our illness does not to be an illness anymore. He knows exactly what to do in a particular illness and has given the right medicines to cure. My mothers D&C was also very successful because of him. A Very genuine doctor. Highly recommend. Thanks Punit Doctor for everything!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was recommended Dr. Punit Bhojani via a friend who had the honor of learning from him as her teacher. Had an absolutely wonderful experience for my treatment with him. He explained to me about my problems in all clarity, transparency and detail throughout the course of my treatment. He truly is an expert in what he does.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ***** ******* ** *** ** *** **** ************** I visited him for my pregnancy checkup . All I can say that he is very good and clears all the doubt you have . In case of any emergency he is available on call and message too . You will definitely get reply within sometime no need to wait for hours . He will give the best advice in any complications . Am thankful to god and him that today my baby is fine with complications I had .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Punit has always been giving crisp and clear advice and treatment. He is constantly in touch with the patient throughout the pregnancy even over the phone. Very friendly and comfortable to share things with. Very calm in explaining if any complication and suggests the best treatments, hence not putting us in panic mode. I highly recommend Punit doctor for pregnant women .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: We consulted Dr Bhojani for my wife, initially to get a second opinion on a procedure.  The doctor raised several vital and valid issues that questioned the first diagnosis, and further tests led us to reject it completely. The doctor's insight and instincts were very impressive.  It saved us from any unnecessary procedures.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Abortion / Medical Termination of Pregnancy (MTP),PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Contraception Advice,
review:
Dr. Punit makes the patient feel absolutely comfortable with properly explaining each and every aspect of the issue and also makes sure the patient is absolutely fine on his treatment. He follows up with the patient through calls and messages and also checks for their well being from time to time.
Absolutely satisfied with his consultation and treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had abortion one year ago ,it was ectopic pregnancy and my old doctor was saying to do Operation but dr.punit help me a lot and treat me within a week with medicines only .after that I started to take treatment for pregnancy conception from dr.punit sir and within a year we get good results ,now I am 7 months pregnant and now also I am taking consultations and treatment from punit sir only.he is very friendly and kind with patients and also coordinating on call.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would definitely recommend this doctor.. he is so polite and explains the patient in very friendly manner.. clinic is well equipped and clean.. each and every point he will explain clearly.. doctor will not prescribe unnecessary medicines and test.. it helped me a lot meeting him.. thank u so much

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had my first consultation with him online since I couldn't visit him personally due to some problems... he gave me correct advice and medicines to solve my morning sickness problem since this is my first time and had no clue about the whole pregnancy experience... overall NW I have visited him twice and I am satisfied and will recommend him to all my friends and acquaintances for any gynace related health issues..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Punit is really a gem of our life. His friendly nature and explanation is highly appreciative. He made my journey to motherhood possible after successful attempts. We deeply extend our gratitude to him for completing my family. He is an awesome human being first n then an awesome dr. equivalent to god. I would recommend  Dr. Punit to everyone n hv faith in God n him for making things possible n successful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I’ve had the best experience with doctor Bhojani. He explains the problem/case very well and is always positive about your treatment which makes you also feel positive. Another best quality is that he is always available for you and will respond to your messages within minutes.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

He is very friendly, practical  and cooperative Doctor. He is one of few  doctors who really make you comfortable,  even reachable on phone , whatsapp etc and patiently listen and answers all your queries and  provide proper treatment  We consulted  Dr. Punit Bhojani for pregnancy and we got result within three months..
We strongly recommend Dr. Punit Bhojani.

tags: None
review:
Dr Punit is an excellent Gynaecologist* *** ********* *** ********* ** ** ***** . He takes time to explain patiently. 
He responds promptly every time you need to consult. 
Dr Punit is caring , sensitive and soft spoken which immediately puts you at ease as a patient. 
I would highly recommend and trust him as a Gynaecologist

tags: None
review: We were planning for baby and I was having gynac issues. So had visited doctor Punit as recommended  by our relative. *** ***** ******** **** **** ********** For me the pregnancy was bit crucial and I was on complete bed rest during pregnancy but  Dr. Punit was always available on calls, WhatsApp for any support needed during entire pregnancy.. Even post pregnancy he guided for any questions. Thanks to Doctor I could deliver a healthy baby without any issues. I highly recommend Dr. Punit..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ** ****** *** ***** He is learned, humble and gives all his patients a level of care and empathy which makes the most difficult things seem bearable. He definitely saved my life and performed a life saving procedure for me with no regards to general formalities which may have caused delay and subsequently lead to pretty grave consequences for us. He is patient and always available and genuinely keeps a constant check on his patients. I hope this review helps all the couples out there like us who are in Mumbai working alone away from family cause we need this level of care and attention.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I am overwhelmed with the Doctor ,as in first visit he was so promising about my issue that we(Me and my Husband) did not feel afraid of going further with the procedures. He explained everything very comfortably and made things easy.

After consulting many doctors we found that mine was a critical case to operate with so we were very scared but after meeting Dr Punit Bhojani he took us in his confidence to have faith and everything will go fine and hence it was a successful surgery.

So a big thanks to Dr Bhojani :-)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am getting treated under Dr. Punit Bhojani since March 2020. He is a very experienced and a selfless doctor. Will never ask you to do multiple tests, nor will ask for extra things.
Post March 2020 lockdown happened, he always consulted me on monthly basis via calls and whatsapp and never asked for consultation fee for that period.
A very genuine and a helpful person whose only motive is to give you the best and genuine treatment.
I have this PCOD issue since past 12 years and had even developed severe facial hair. But post his treatment, within 6 months, I could see great results.

Will surely recommend everyone to visit him to get a safe and genuine treatment with effective reaults!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: *** ***** *** ********* ** *** **** ************ * ****** Really very happy with his treatment and approach towards patient... 9 months of pregnancy, painful period of delivery and post natal care.......all difficult time....but with sir's approach and treatment and availability for patient all the time....this period was very smooth and we both my wife n me....really could enjoy those days to fullest without any worry for medical complications..... Such a wonderful doctor...will recommend every patient looking for Obstetrician and Gynecologist.....should visit him ......visit him with Ur problems and be assured....you will remember him always....and forget the problem....

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I started to consult with Dr. Punit in May 2020 and it has been a wonderful, wonderful experience. Along with subject matter and treatment expertise, Dr. Punit is extremely approachable and puts one at ease. While he is candid and transparent, I found that his overall outlook towards treatment and care, be it pre-pregnancy or during pregnancy is so free of stress or any toxic urgency to move things fast, that I felt immensely benefited by it. He is extremely encouraging and being the only direct face to face meetings I had during the pandemic, I felt immensely supported and looked forward to the visits. Very grateful for this, my husband and I :)

review: Doctor is very friendly and he guided us with proper process. His 24/7 availability is like cherry on cake

review:
*** ** ****** ****** * **** ****** *** ******* ******* ***** ** ** ***** Dr Punit Bhojani name was suggested by another doctor. Bit hesitated initially before visiting him as new in town and how Mumbai's doctor gonna treat and charges, etc. But we were overwhelmed after visiting him, he made me n my wife comfortable, explained everything(pros n cons) and treated her with ease which other doctors were exaggerating. 

Big thanks to Dr Punit Bhojani. Cheers!!
